price: Indeed, there is nothing hidden from Allah on earth or in heaven.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ شَيۡءٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
